org.digitalertachograph.DDDQuery
Class DebugLogger

java.lang.Object
  org.digitalertachograph.DDDQuery.DebugLogger

public class DebugLogger
extends java.lang.Object

Class for outputting debug messages.

Field Summary
static int logLevel
          The log level for outputting messages
static int LOGLEVEL_ALL
          Debug loglevel ALL: every output will be logged
static int LOGLEVEL_ERROR
          Debug loglevel ERROR: errors will be logged
static int LOGLEVEL_INFO
          Debug loglevel INFO: information will be logged
static int LOGLEVEL_INFO_EXTENDED
          Debug loglevel INFO_EXTENDED: extended information will be logged
static int LOGLEVEL_NOTHING
          Debug loglevel NOTHING: nothing will be logged
static java.io.PrintStream logPrintStream
          The printstream where messages will be put

InitEnv

public static void InitEnv()
Initialises the static settings for the DebugLogger from environment variables. DEBUGLOGLEVEL: sets the debug log level DEBUGPRINTSTREAM: sets the printstream where the debug messages are put.

                  char c)

                   java.lang.String format,

println

public void println(int level,
                    java.lang.String x)
Prints the given string followed by a new line for the given debug level.

Parameters:
level - the debug level
x - the string to be printed

println

public void println(int level,
                    java.lang.String x,
                    boolean b)
Puts the given string followed by a new line for the given debug level on hold until the next print function is called. Then the string will be put to the print stream.

Parameters:
level - the debug level
x - the string to be printed
b - indicates delayed printing

println

public void println(int level)
Prints a new line for the given debug level.

Parameters:
level - the debug level

resetPrintDelayed

public void resetPrintDelayed()
Resets delayed printing
